name: Tan-Tan-Tanuki
description:
------------------

Tan-Tan-Tanuki is a prototype game that I made to make it fun to learn about Yokai and to introduce people to the world of Yokai and Japanese folklore. It is the first game that I developed by myself.

Tan-Tan-Tanuki is a 2d platformer where you play a boy who is transformed into a Tanuki and is transported to the Yokai Realm. To get back home, you must seek out the Tanuki elders and thwart the Kitsune's trickery in order for the elders to change you back and send you home. 

Gameplay

------------------

Platform and Collect coins as a Tanuki !
Explore the Yokai World as you try to return to the Human World

Meet Various Yokai along the way!
